definition: axon (long thin axis of nerve cell)
axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated

sentences.english: The prognosis of diffuse cerebral laceration and diffuse axonal injury was worse.
sentences.chinese: 瀰漫性腦挫裂傷或瀰漫性軸索損傷預後較差。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the regularity of axonal injury in experimental hydrocephalus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腦積水中軸索損傷的發展變化規律。

sentences.english: Demyelination and axonal degeneration were confirmed electromicroscopicaly through sural nerve biopsy.
sentences.chinese: 神經活檢證實同時有脫髓鞘和軸索變性。

sentences.english: They serve as natural impediments to neurite growth in response to injury.
sentences.chinese: 它們是損傷後軸索反應性生長的天然抑制物。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the diagnosis and treatment of diffuse axonal injury(DAI).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討彌散性軸索損傷的診斷與治療。

sentences.english: Objective To analyse the therapeutic effect of diffuse axonal injury(DAI).
sentences.chinese: 目的分析腦瀰漫性軸索損傷治療的療效。

sentences.english: ObjectieTo study the effect of rehabilitation treatment on diffuse axonal injury(DAI).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腦瀰漫性軸索損傷的康復療效。
